question:
Consider the following pairs:
  1. INS Tillanchang - a Water Jet Fast Attack Craft (WJFAC)
  2. INS Aridhaman - nuclear-powered ballistic missile submarine
  3. INS Sarvekshak - vessel with solar panel
Which of the above is/are correct?
explanation: INS Tillanchang, a Water Jet Fast Attack Craft (WJFAC), was recently commissioned into the Indian Navy. It is the third ship of four follow-on WJFAC built by the Garden Reach Shipbuilders and Engineers (GRSE) Kolkata. The first two ships of this class are Tarmugli and Tihayu. The survey class vessel INS Sarvekshak is the first in the country to be fitted with solar panels. INS Aridhaman is the second vessel in Arihant class nuclear submarine.
